MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G66 postcode area of Milton of Campsie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.30pm to carry out repairs to faulty equipment on the overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.37pm on Thursday 21st January 2021.
